column2: Tri stana / Stari Grad / Adzemovica / Logavina
column37:
Prodajemo tri stana u ulici Adzemovica na broju 26. Izvodjac radova je firma Duljevic doo. Objekat je prosao tehnicki prijem I stanovi su spremni za prodaju I upis u zemljisnje knjige.

Na prodaju su tri strana sljedecih kvadratura I karakterisrika:

1. Dvoetazni stan sa pripadajucom ostavom i bastom (zasebna cestica) I povrsine od 82 m2 - 520.000 KM

2. Jednoetazni stan na prvom spratu povrsine 78 m2 - 440.000 KM

3. Dvoetazni stan na drugom spratu povrsine 120 m2 - 660.000 KM

Postoji mogucnost I kupovine cijelog objekta uz dogovor.

Objekat posjeduje I garaze I ostave.

Cijena garaze iznosi 30.000 KM.
Cijena ostave iznosi 15.000 KM

Podno grijanje I ventilokoileri u kombinaciji sa Daikin toplotnim pumpama. Sve sobe imaju punu klimatizaciju uz poseban termostat. 

Kupatila su zavrsena vrhunskom italijanskom keramikom velikog formata. Keramika je uradjena gerung tehnikom te ne postoji ni jedna lajsna u kupatilu. Keramiku je postavljao Esad Kahrovic.

Stanovi su SMART, te je moguca kontrola svih funkcija putem mobitela kao sto su rasvjeta, raf store, alarm itd.

Stolarija je sedmokomorna Rehau sa troslojnim staklima.

Ostalo je jos uraditi zavrsno gletovanja (u slucaju da kupac zeli promijeniti pozicije struje u ovoj fazi nije problem uraditi I izabrati parket.

Orijentacija stanova je JUG uz maksimalni broj suncanih sati.

column2: Benis Bulevar Stup, dvosoban stan od 46 m2!
column37: Sa ponosom vam predstavljamo novi stambeno poslovni objekat na Stupu u Stupskoj ulici, nas novi projekat Benis Bulevar. Kao dokazani lider u izgradnji stambenih jedinica, nasa firma Benis d.o.o. nastavlja sa ponudom prvoklasnih stanova na odlicnoj lokaciji u gradu.  Radi se o vecem stambeno poslovnom objektu u izgradnji u jednom od trenutno najatraktivnijih naselja u gradu na Stupu na popularnom Bulevaru. Objekat u izgradnji sa rokom zavrsetka radova do kraja tekuce 2023 godine. Projektovan po savremenim standardima uz kvalitetno izvodjenje radova i ugradnju vrhunskih materijala i opreme.  Stambeno poslovni objekat spratnosti suteren + prizemlje + 8 spratova gdje je suteren planiran za garazni prostor, prizemlje objekta ce biti poslovnog karaktera a na 8 spratova ukupno 85 stambenih jedinica razlicitih kvadratura i svaka sa balkonom. Stan u ponudi za prodaju od 45,94 m2 po naravi dvosoban sa balkonom sa izvrsnim rasporedom prostorija. Sastoji se od ulaznog hodnika, kuhinje sa prostorom za trpezariju, dnevnog boravka sa balkonom, spavace sobe i kupatila.  Visoki standard gradnje i ugradbenih materijala:  -vanjska stolarija REHAU Synego, 7 komorna sa troslojnim Low-e staklomÂ   -Â  toplotne pumpe "Bergen" za sistem grijanja i hladjenja  - hrastov prvoklasni parket u prostorijama  -prvoklasna hrastova unutrasnja stolarija  - podno grijanje u kupatilima  - protivprovalna i protupozarna blindo vrata  - lift u zgradi koji veze garazni dio sa stambenim etazama  -keramicke plocice u hodniku i kupatilima  - termoizolacija 10 cm  Zgrada se nalazi na odlicnoj poziciji u naselju u okolini mnogih sadrzaja, javnog prevoza, restorana, pekara, nekoliko vecih supermarketa, mnogih prodajno usluznih trgovina, vrtica...  Pored stanova kupci su u prilici kupiti i garazno mjesto u suterenu zgrade odnosno vanjsko parking mjesto. column2: Benis Bulevar Stup, trosoban stan od 58 m2!
column37: Sa ponosom vam predstavljamo novi stambeno poslovni objekat na Stupu u Stupskoj ulici, nas novi projekat Benis Bulevar. Kao dokazani lider u izgradnji stambenih jedinica, nasa firma Benis d.o.o. nastavlja sa ponudom prvoklasnih stanova na odlicnoj lokaciji u gradu.  Radi se o vecem stambeno poslovnom objektu u izgradnji u jednom od trenutno najatraktivnijih naselja u gradu na Stupu na popularnom Bulevaru. Objekat u izgradnji sa rokom zavrsetka radova do kraja tekuce 2023 godine. Projektovan po savremenim standardima uz kvalitetno izvodjenje radova i ugradnju vrhunskih materijala i opreme.  Stambeno poslovni objekat spratnosti suteren + prizemlje + 8 spratova gdje je suteren planiran za garazni prostor, prizemlje objekta poslovnog karaktera a na 8 spratova ukupno 85 stambenih jedinica razlicitih kvadratura i svaka sa balkonom. Stan u ponudi za prodaju od 58,10 m2 po naravi trosoban sa balkonom sa izvrsnim rasporedom prostorija. Sastoji se od ulaznog hodnika, kuhinje sa prostorom za trpezariju, dnevnog boravka sa balkonom, dvije spavace sobe i kupatila. Visoki standard gradnje i ugradbenih materijala:  -vanjska stolarija REHAU Synego, 7 komorna sa troslojnim Low-e staklomÂ   -Â toplotne pumpe "Bergen" za sistem grijanja i hladjenja  - hrastov prvoklasni parket u prostorijama  -prvoklasna hrastova unutrasnja stolarija  - podno grijanje u kupatilima  - protivprovalna i protupozarna blindo vrata  - lift u zgradi koji veze garazni dio sa stambenim etazama  -keramicke plocice u hodniku i kupatilima  - termoizolacija 10 cm  Zgrada se nalazi na odlicnoj poziciji u naselju u okolini mnogih sadrzaja, javnog prevoza, restorana, pekara, nekoliko vecih supermarketa, mnogih prodajno usluznih trgovina, vrtica... Pored stanova kupci su u prilici kupiti i garazno mjesto u suterenu zgrade odnosno vanjsko parking mjesto. Za vise informacija o dostupnim stanovima i cijenama kontaktirajte nasu prodaju:  Telefon: + 387 61 320 330 GSM/Viber Email: benisbulevar@gmail.com  Benis Bulevar Stup Stupska bb 71000 Sarajevo

Top attractive location - Exclusive!


For sale is a relatively large apartment in the strict center of the city. The apartment is in the very center of all the most important cultural, educational, sports, health, business, judicial, social, entertainment and various other facilities and institutions, yet far enough away and isolated from the busiest streets and tram noise. Definitely the best location in the city because within a radius of 250 m there is everything you need for a pleasant and beautiful life, such as the following facilities and institutions: BiH Presidency, Center Municipality, MUP, ARIA shopping center, Konzum, AMKO, Mercator, KSC Skenderija, FIS-center for sports and recreation, Vrazova health center, emergency room, pharmacies, several different banks, theater, children's theater, kindergarten, playroom, gymnasiums, facial and body care salons, boutiques, Goethe Institute, several embassies (Croatia, Serbia, Greece, Germany, France...), restaurants, cafes, main post office, religious buildings, Faculty of Law, Academy of Fine Arts, Municipal and Cantonal Court, Land Registry Office, notary offices, law offices, Chamber of Commerce, a large park, public transport stations and much more...

The building also has its own yard with a remote-controlled ramp, which serves as a parking lot for the tenants.


An ideal opportunity!


According to the ZK excerpt, the apartment has 97 m2 of living space, with a note that in addition to the living space of the specified square footage, there are plus two balconies. The apartment is a semi-living room type on the ideal third floor. It is oriented on both sides and sunny throughout the day. The orientation of the apartment is South (southeast) and North (northwest) in a building of very high quality construction that does not have an elevator.

The apartment has a huge potential for comfortable living, and considering the spaciousness of the apartment, it can provide comfort and a nice life to both couples and multi-member families.

It is also a unique opportunity for buyers-investors to renovate and equip the apartment for further sale or rental to foreigners who live in Sarajevo and who are looking for comfort in the heart of the city where everything is within reach.

There is also the possibility for the future owner of the apartment to declare the apartment or part of the apartment for business purposes as desired, because it is really a fantastic location and number of floors, and it has extra potential for e.g.: notary or lawyer's offices, project offices, surgeries, various agencies or bureaus, salons and similar to that. It is therefore suitable and very useful for customers, both for individuals and for business entities.


The apartment consists of:


entrance hallvestibulesmall corridorkitchen with dining roomlarge living room southeastlarge bedroom southeastlarge bedroom northwestpantrytoiletsbathroomsplus two larger attached balconies (one on the south side which is glazed and looks towards the courtyard, while the other is on the north side and looks towards the street)
The interior and exterior joinery in the apartment is wooden. There is parquet in the entrance hall, hallway and rooms, while there are vinyl planks in the kitchen with dining room, small hallway and pantry, and there are ceramic tiles in the bathroom and toilet, and there is terrazzo on the balconies. The ceiling height is 2.75 m. The heating is gas central, and in the living room there is an original brick fireplace - a stove with high-gloss bricks, which can also be used for heating if necessary, but can also be used as decoration. The apartment was generally renovated 32 years ago, and partly about 10 years ago, when gas central heating was introduced and part of the exterior carpentry was replaced. Now is the opportunity and the opportunity is left for the future owner to arrange and furnish the apartment according to his wishes, taste, purpose and needs.
